translation.error_loading_conversations: Error: {{error}}. Please check your Supabase connection and table setup.
translation.no_conversations_found: No conversations found. Please add some to your Supabase 'conversations' table.
translation.not_logged_in_warning: You are not logged in. Your progress will not be saved.
translation.confirm_delete_description: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone. Your progress will be permanently lost. To complete the deletion, you will need to visit the Supabase dashboard after signing out.
translation.check_email_confirmation: Check your email for the confirmation link!
translation.check_email_password_reset: Check your email for the password reset link!
translation.password_updated_successfully: Your password has been updated successfully!
translation.dont_have_account: Don't have an account? Sign Up
translation.already_have_account: Already have an account? Sign In
translation.hint_type_something: Type something first to get a hint.
translation.hint_looks_correct: Hint: Your input looks correct so far!
translation.no_phrase_hint: No phrase to get a hint for.
translation.getting_the_hang_of_it: You're getting the hang of it!
translation.question: Question
translation.failed_to_load_user_progress: Failed to load user progress. Please ensure you have created the 'user_progress' table and configured Row Level Security correctly.
translation.failed_to_create_user_progress: Failed to create a new user progress record. Please check your database permissions.
translation.profile_guest_message: Please log in to view your profile and saved progress.
